entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot build/restore maccatalyst targeting .net6 due to missing package #33530
  • Task.Delay(Timeout.Infinite, cancellationToken) does not return when cancellation is requested #33527

Closed

  • NuGet package reference is broken when PackageId is set by a props file in a NuGet package. #33528

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.4xx] Containers release notes #33537
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] containers: split `Registry.cs` and made it testable #33536
    Area-Containers

Merged

  • Support setting workload set versions in global.json #33441
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/7.0.4xx] implemented logging using `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` in containers #33501
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload and auth fixes #33500
    Area-Containers
  • Add a unique error message when workloads are disabled but a customer is trying to use workloads #33406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--disable-build-servers` to Run and Store CLI commands #33445
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload #33336
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.10
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
